chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 13 mini has the above problem: Invoice address zip code from Schweitenkirchen is 85301, please change! Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have updated the zip code. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

Can you please provide me with the corrected invoice, zip code 85301, so that I can forward it to the customer?

I would be pleased to receive an answer from you.

Have a nice day.

Regards,
Angelica from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the invoice with the updated zip code.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer on 11th June. If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
JY
